summary: A short film about the problems that accompany an actor as he auditions, due to his multi-ethnic appearance.
cast: Vin Diesel|Lewis Steidl|Cara Gaffen|Phillip Jones|Ivan Jordain|F. Valentino Morales|Erik Stephen|Ruthy Otero|Kalimi Baxter|David Rainey|August Roc|Emilie Daveyac|Colette Duvall|Barry Burns|Cheryl Adam|Richard Width|Nancy Alison
title: Multifacial
